Public-Self:SELF.active_event:UINTEGER_8// Application loses/gains visibility
Public-Self:SELF.key_down:UINTEGER_8// Keys pressed
Public-Self:SELF.key_up:UINTEGER_8// Keys released 
Public-Self:SELF.mouse_motion:UINTEGER_8// Mouse moved
Public-Self:SELF.mouse_button_down:UINTEGER_8// Mouse button pressed
Public-Self:SELF.mouse_button_up:UINTEGER_8// Mouse button released
Public-Self:SELF.joy_axis_motion:UINTEGER_8// Joystick axis motion
Public-Self:SELF.joy_ball_motion:UINTEGER_8// Joystick trackball motion
Public-Self:SELF.joy_hat_motion:UINTEGER_8// Joystick hat position change
Public-Self:SELF.joy_button_down:UINTEGER_8// Joystick button pressed
Public-Self:SELF.joy_button_up:UINTEGER_8// Joystick button released
Public-Self:SELF.sdl_quit:UINTEGER_8// User-requested quit
Public-Self:SELF.sys_wm_event:UINTEGER_8// System specific event
Public-Self:SELF.video_resize:UINTEGER_8// User resized video mode
Public-Self:SELF.video_expose:UINTEGER_8// Screen needs to be redrawn
Public-Self:SELF.user_event:UINTEGER_8// Events SDL_USEREVENT through SDL_MAXEVENTS-1 are for your use
